[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Gas] Can extreme decimal differences (e.g., decimals_a=18, decimals_b=0) cause expensive pow() operations leading to DoS? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: update_cetus_position_value()] [DoS] Can repeatedly updating the same position value exhaust storage or cause state bloat? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Does finish_update_asset_value properly validate that usd_value is reasonable, or can inflated values be set directly? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Can get_defi_asset be called with asset_type that doesn't exist, causing undefined behavior? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Is there a maximum usd_value limit in finish_update_asset_value to prevent u256::MAX overflow attacks? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Can asset values be updated multiple times per block/transaction, and does this violate any vault invariants? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] Does the vault track previous asset values to detect suspicious jumps that might indicate manipulation? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Position] Can concentrated liquidity positions with very narrow tick ranges cause amount calculations to be inaccurate? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Position] Can positions with liquidity in only one token (out of range) cause value calculation to be incorrect if fees are not considered? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Position] Does get_position_amounts include uncollected fees, or are fees tracked separately causing undervaluation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Position] Can position ownership transfer between valuation calls cause amount_a/amount_b to change unexpectedly? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Complex Attack] Can an attacker create two correlated positions in inverse pools (A/B and B/A) to manipulate aggregate vault value? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Complex Attack] Can an attacker manipulate position values during vault rebalancing to extract value through timing-based arbitrage? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: update_cetus_position_value()] [Complex Attack] Can an attacker update position values in a specific order to bypass aggregate slippage or health checks? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Complex Attack] Can combining pool manipulation with oracle manipulation allow bypassing slippage check while extracting significant value? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Integration] [Complex Attack] Can an attacker use update_cetus_position_value in combination with vault deposit/withdrawal to front-run or sandwich other users? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Precision] When converting from X64 format, can the intermediate value (sqrt_price_x64 as u256) * DECIMAL lose precision before division? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Precision] Does squaring the sqrt price and then adjusting for decimals accumulate rounding errors compared to alternative calculation orders? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Precision] Can mul_with_oracle_price introduce rounding that systematically favors or disfavors the vault over many updates? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Function: calculate_cetus_position_value()] [Precision] When DECIMAL (1e18) is used in multiple operations, does cumulative precision loss become significant? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Configuration] Can OracleConfig be maliciously configured with incorrect decimal values for standard tokens causing all calculations to fail? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Configuration] Is there validation that dex_slippage() returns values in expected range (0-10000), or can invalid config cause check bypass? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Configuration] Can coin_decimals return values > 255 (u8::MAX overflow) causing incorrect pow calculations? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Configuration] Are oracle prices required to be non-zero, or can 0 prices propagate through calculations? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/cetus_adaptor.move] [Dependencies] If cetusclmm modules are upgraded, can interface changes break this adaptor silently? (Medium)
